remarks: Lemma for ~ subfacp1 .  Properties of a bijection on ` K ` augmented with the two-element flip to get a bijection on ` K u. { 1 , M } ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jan-2015.)
statement:

subfacp1lem.a $e |- A = { f | ( f : ( 1 ... ( N + 1 ) ) -1-1-onto-> ( 1 ... ( N + 1 ) ) /\ A. y e. ( 1 ... ( N + 1 ) ) ( f ` y ) =/= y ) } $.

subfacp1lem2b $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. K ) -> ( F ` X ) = ( G ` X ) ) $.
